summary: The Tribal Healthcare Careers Act (H.R. 5378) aims to improve healthcare for Native American populations. It mandates a 15% set-aside of funds from the health profession opportunity grant program for Indian tribes, tribal organizations, and Tribal Colleges and Universities. Additionally, the bill guarantees the Secretary of Health and Human Services award a minimum of 10 grants under this subsection to eligible entities such as those listed above. The amendments are to take effect in October 2025.
